channel.title: Ice barrage in cheezscape
channel.description:
When I cast ice barrage on a npc the ice dosnt show but when I cast it on a player it does show how do I make it work on a npc? also change xp each time a spell is cast
also each time you kill a npc or you die you get connection lost :confused:
